content:
They just said it on the news. There’s no hope for a cure. It’s not happening. The WHO has stopped looking. Apparently, they’re now just taking people out once they test positive. I don’t know how much longer I can stay cooped up inside my apartment, I’m losing my fucking mind. Every doctor in the goddamn world and they can’t find one fucking cure? This is bullshit. They’re trying to take us out, that’s what’s happening. It’s not like any of the shot callers are sick. Only us, the “average joe”. Everything I did for my country, does that not mean shit to these fuckers?

They told me what I was doing was good. That is was what needed to be done for peace, and that the world was a better place because of my actions then, and the world and my place inside it made sense. Now I’m wondering if any of it was true. When you break into someones house in the middle of the night, and you shoot first and ask questions later - this is supposed to be justice? When you intercept food and water, the building blocks for survival - this is supposed to be justice? Really? I deserve this, don’t I? This is what I did to them. I thought I was doing something good - and it was easy too. I just did what I was told. Maybe that’s where I went wrong. Maybe if I had the fucking guts to just stand up, abandon my duty, even if I spent my life in prison… it’d be a hell of a lot better than sitting here, waiting to die. What the fuck is a prion, anyways?
